Articles.Content:
Ok well as the title says, im looking for a way to simplify having to manually edit the offsets in the .craft file, as there are a few sci-fi style craft im working on that i need to have some offset and i dont want any physical parts actually touching some stuff.

Is there a mod that allows one to disable the SPH/VAB limits on how far out you can drag a part? Cause if so i can find it, and if it doesnt exist id appreciate of someone made a mod to do this (id do it myself but im very busy with real life stuff and dont expect much freetime in the next few weeks).

+1

this definitely should get a switch in the stock cheat menu

I'd like this as well, currently to attach ground lights pointing up at my craft from the pad I need to use clamps or trusses laid along the ground. Would be nice to just be able to offset the lights out to the pad corners
